title: Poetry Craft
description: A reading and craft class for students with some experience and special interest in writing poetry. There will be analysis and discussion of representative examples of poetry from the present and previous ages. Reading and lectures will accompany writing exercises. Restricted to major codes LT34 and LT42 and minor codes LT34 and LT39 during first pass of registration. All other students may register during second pass of registration with the approval of the department.  Prerequisites:  LTWR 8B.
